thread.title: Attackers go on malware-free diet - CIO
thread.title_full: Attackers go on malware-free diet - CIO - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: CIO
title: Attackers go on malware-free diet - CIO
text:
To avoid detection, some hackers are ditching malware and living "off the land" -- using whatever tools are already available in the compromised systems, according to a new report from Dell SecureWorks. In fact, this has been the case for nearly all the intrusions analyzed by the Dell SecureWorks' Incident Response Team last year.
 CIO.
